Trinity::

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!!!" shouted scared Trinity and ran where 
Perplex was

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: What a coincidence that Trinity doesn't like spiders, don't 
you think?
> 
> BIC: A huge, monstrous, tarantula climbs out of the ship and looks 
at Trinity. He is bright orange and hairy, and the scariest part was, 
that he was an Orange Baboon Tarantula. The most aggressive of all 
Tarantulas. EVER! And there he was, staring, legs pushing him off the 
ground like a large cage, and looking at the 3 who had left the 
base...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: airly2000@y... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Wednesday, June 13, 2001 11:44 PM
>   Subject: Re: Zero
> 
> 
>   Trinity:
> 
>   "OK " said Trinity and she ran towards the ship, she tapped the 
>   ship's door and said "Helloooo, come outside and say helloooo"
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > Perplex: Fine with me, Trinity. But be careful.
>   > 
>   > Perplex walked outside of the base and Zeni followed him. 
Perplex 
>   walked slowly towards the opened up ship.
>   > 
>   > Perplex: Hello?...
>   > 
>   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: airly2000@y... 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   Sent: Wednesday, June 13, 2001 11:11 PM
>   >   Subject: Re: Zero
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   Trinity:
>   > 
>   >   "Hey pals can I go with you???" said Trinity while she ran 
>   towards 
>   >   the exit...
>   > 
>   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   >   > A whistling noise was heard outside. Anyone who could hear 
must 
>   >   have heard
>   >   > it, it was extremely loud and ear piercing. It crashed 
right 
>   >   outside the
>   >   > Chivtron base with a huge thud, just mere feet from the 
front 
>   door. 
>   >   The
>   >   > driver of this tiny ship, which is what the object is, is a 
>   very 
>   >   good one.
>   >   > 
>   >   > Arrow: Well, here I was thinking we'd survive. I guess I 
was 
>   wrong.
>   >   > 
>   >   > Arrow walked off into another room.
>   >   > 
>   >   > Perplex: Well, maybe it's peaceful.
>   >   > 
>   >   > Perplex was afraid, though. Zeni walked up to the front 
door.
>   >   > 
>   >   > Zeni: Can I go out and see what it is?
>   >   > 
>   >   > Perplex: Hold on one minute. Arrow. We might need you.
>   >   > 
>   >   > Arrow did not come back, however. Then a voice was heard. 
It 
>   must 
>   >   have been
>   >   > heard, he was yelling at the top of his lungs.
>   >   > 
>   >   > Voice: Why do people put asteroids in the way! I don't 
deserve 
>   >   that! I am
>   >   > better than that! And who put this ship in the way! Damn it 
all 
>   to 
>   >   hell!
>   >   > 
>   >   > The ship opened...
